content.prompt: Based on the data above, which of the following is the most likely conclusion of a study addressing the following scientific question. What will happen to methane levels in the atmosphere at 60째N to 75째N latitude from 2018 to 2027 if the trend from 2011 to 2017 continues?

choices.label: Methane levels in the atmosphere will increase because of increased growth of producers at latitudes greater than 60째N.
Methane levels in the atmosphere will increase because melting or thawing permafrost will lead to an increase in the amount of organic matter that will decompose.
Methane levels in the atmosphere will decrease because melting sea ice will increase transportation in the ocean by ships at latitudes greater than 60째N.
Methane levels in the atmosphere will decrease because oil and gas exploration will increase as permafrost continues to melt or thaw.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Interpret experimental data and results in relation to a given hypothesis.
